short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saving important chats in your ChatGPT and Gemini

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Ever lost an important chat with ChatGPT or Gemini? No more worries! Introducing AI Chat Bookmarks, a revolutionary extension that lets you easily save and organize your valuable AI conversations."

How it works:

Simple to use: A convenient button is added to your ChatGPT page, allowing you to instantly bookmark your current chat.

Customizable: Change the bookmark's title or add notes for easy reference.

Secure and private: All data is stored locally on your device, ensuring your conversations remain confidential.

Flexible: Export or import your bookmarks to keep your chats organized across different devices.

**Experience the power of AI Chat Bookmarks and never lose another important conversation again**
